headline: Ohio win may obscure the mixed bag of Trump's primary strength
author: Keith Naughton
sentences: Prior to the Trump endorsement, the Free Beacon poll had hedge fund manager David McCormick in the lead at 25 percent to 19 percent for Oz, and Fox News had McCormick up 24 percent to 15 percent.
His endorsement of celebrity TV star Dr. Oz has pushed Oz to the lead among a scrum of candidates, but the gain has not been nearly as dramatic as the Vance improvement in Ohio.
Among the key primary states of Georgia, North Carolina, Ohio and Pennsylvania, Trump gets a big break with Ohio, his best state of the bunch in 2020, going first.
By Election Day, Mandel gained 4 points and Dolan picked up over 16 points, while Mike Gibbons (down 10.4 points) and Jane Timken (down 3.1 points) lost ground.
